name: Lovebirb
description:
Lovebirb is a rhythm-based dating game about finding love one date at a time. Go on Bumbirb and swipe away to meet hot and single birbs in your area! Impress them by showing your best moves to the beat of the music. Sometimes you’ll succeed. Sometimes... it gets a little awkward. But fret not! You have plenty of chances to find your perfect tempo. So keep swiping!

Featuring:

  • A one-of-a-kind dating experience! 💖
  • Lots of interesting and lovely birbs 🦆
  • The sweetest tunes to dance to 🎵
